title: compile: is it a implicit cast?
body:
```
C:\Users\chan>go version
go version go1.5.2 windows/amd64
```

```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"
)

var num int64 = 0xfffff

func main() {
	// section 1
	x := string(num)
	fmt.Println(len(x))

	// section 2
	y := string(rune(num))
	fmt.Println(len(y))
}
```
see section 1, is it a implicit cast?
I think section 2 is better.
